meanings.definition: Covering a large area in an untidy or unattractive way.
meanings.sent1: The garden behind the old house was the sprawliest I had ever seen, with weeds growing everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned factory was the sprawliest building in town, with broken windows and graffiti covering its walls.
meanings.sent3: The cat made the sprawliest mess in the kitchen, knocking over pots and pans in its quest for a treat.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tangled and unkempt, looked like the sprawliest bush in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sprawliest spiderweb stretched across the entire doorway, making it impossible to pass without breaking it.

meanings.definition: Extending over a large area in an untidy or unattractive way.
meanings.sent1: The sprawliest branches of the tree reached out in all directions, creating a messy canopy.
meanings.sent2: The sprawliest power lines in the city crisscrossed above the streets, creating a chaotic overhead view.
meanings.sent3: The sprawliest pile of laundry in the room seemed to have a life of its own, growing larger each day.
meanings.sent4: The city's sprawliest road wound through the hills, making navigation confusing for drivers.
meanings.sent5: The sprawliest graffiti covered the entire side of the building, creating a colorful but messy display.
